heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40, except low to mid 40s in southeastern valleys. Winds variable to southwest at around 5 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Some clearing early, then clouds redeveloping from west to east. Areas of fog or freezing fog, mainly east of the Greens. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s west of the Greens, and upper teens to mid 20s east. Winds becoming south to southeast 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy. A rising chance of morning rain showers far north, and in New York, with a rising chance elsewhere in the afternoon, reaching southern New Hampshire late. Highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s. Winds becoming south 5 to 10 mph in areas east of the Green Mountains, 5 to 15 mph and gusting to 25 mph west of the Greens.
